Harpactorini Diaspidini Ectinoderini }}

'Harpactorinae' is a large subfamily of the reduviid (assassin bugs). About 300
genera and 2000 species worldwide have been described. (Putshkov & Putshkov
1985; Maldonado-Capriles 1990) Some of the species of the genera
[[Zelus (genus)|Zelus]], [[Pselliopus]], [[Sinea]] and [[Apiomerus]] are of
interest as natural enemies of crop pests.
